Package org.opensourcephysics.controls

Class XMLTreePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.opensourcephysics.controls.XMLTreePanel

  • public class XMLTreePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This is a split pane view of an XML tree and its contents.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
